column2: Briefly put, doctor, the case is this, said Adam Adams.

column2: I want to know if there is anything known to the medical world, a powder or something of that sort, strong enough to kill a person if he should breathe of it.

column2: Sidham was in a state of keen excitement.

column2: No such mystery as the double tragedy had occurred in that neighborhood before, and all of the inhabitants were anxious to hear the latest news and learn what the coroner and the police were going to do.
